channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Structure Fire; INC#1871; 10:50PM; 7416 S Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xYvIay; #VermontKnolls; One-story vacant multi-family residential building with fire in one unit. Offensive mode.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E233 E264 E33 E46 E64 RA257 RA57 RA846 T33 T64; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1474; 06:21PM; 3725 N Stockbridge Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xYvUqk; #ElSereno; *Corrected Address* Firefighters responded to a two-story residential building (first-floor garage with second-floor living space) where a fire appeared to have started outside and spread into the attic and second floor. Firefighters advanced hose lines inside the structure and ascended ladders to provide vertical ventilation from the roof. Firefighters performed an interior search and found the abandoned structure to be vacant. It took 40 firefighters 18 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 47; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC2 CM20 CM22 E1 E12 E16 E2 E201 E212 E47 EM1 RA12 RA47 SO1 T1 T12; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1474; 06:03PM; 3725 N Stockbridge Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xYvUqk; #ElSereno; Two-story home (possibly vacant) with heavy smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 47; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC2 CM20 CM22 E1 E12 E16 E2 E201 E212 E47 EM1 RA12 RA47 SO1 T1 T12; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Multi-Patient Traffic Collision; INC#1257; 03:50PM; 6078 W Santa Monica Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JCCyFg; #Hollywood; Firefighters responded to a three-vehicle collisions that resulted in seven patients. One was transported in critical condition. The other 6 sustained only minor injuries. At least one of them was also transported to the hospital. Unknown age/gender. LAPD Inc # 3384.; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E27 E82 EM5 RA27 RA29 RA41 RA829 RA835 RA861 T27; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Fatal Traffic Collision; INC#0212; 04:11AM; 18840 W Sesnon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3UE0I8T; #PorterRanch; PRELIM: Solo vehicle traffic collision with fire in Porter Ranch Park. One person (undetermined age/gender) deceased and remains at scene. No other injuries. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #593) and Medical Examiner; FS 8; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; E8; CH8; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Civilian Fatality Structure Fire 04/28/2024 INC#1273

item.description: Update Civilian Fatality Structure Fire; INC#1273; 07:30PM; 140 E 71st St; MAP: https://bit.ly/4bdZdUi; #Florence; *Address Corrected* 40 LAFD Firefighters took just 14 minutes to fully extinguish fire within one room of a one-story single family home. While battling flames, firefighters discovered a *52-year-old male* deceased within his residence. No other injuries were reported. One woman displaced by the fire, desired to seek her own accommodations. There was no evidence of functional smoke alarms in the residence, as required by law. The 101-year-old building was not equipped with optional residential fire sprinklers. A positive identification of the decedent, as well as the specific cause, time and manner of his death, will be determined by the County of Los Angeles Medical Examiner. The cause of the fire remains under active investigation by LAFD Investigators. LAFD Public Information Officer Captain Cody Weireter is at scene to assist the media.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 E21 E221 E233 E266 E33 E57 E65 PH1 PI3 RA21 RA33 RA833 SQ21 T21 T33 T66; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Civilian Fatality Structure Fire - Now Out 04/28/2024 INC#1273

item.description: Civilian Fatality Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1273; 06:18PM; 136 E 71st St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JF290o; #Florence; PRELIM: 40 LAFD Firefighters took just 14 minutes (6:32 PM) to respond, access, confine and fully extinguish fire within one room of a one-story single family home. During the aggressive and well coordinated fire attack, firefighters discovered one person deceased inside the residence. Their age, gender and site affiliation have yet to be determined. No other injuries have been reported. The cause of the fire is under active investigation. Media Inquiries: LAPD Newton Division (Incident #3428) and Medical Examiner.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 E21 E221 E233 E266 E33 E57 E65 RA21 RA33 RA833 SQ21 T21 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey
item.category: Civilian Fatality Structure Fire - Now Out

item.description: Hiker Rescue; INC#0585; 10:26AM; Hogback Trail; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QmNJpA; #GriffithPark; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response with L.A. Park Rangers to an adult female hiker with an injured ankle on a remote section of Hogback Trail west of Vista del Valle Drive in Griffith Park. An LAFD Rescue Helicopter lowered a Flight Paramedic to medically assess and stabilize the patient, who will soon be hoisted along with the LAFD Flight Paramedic into the hovering helicopter for continuing in-flight care during direct air transport to an area hospital.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E235 E35 H4 H7 HA4 HA7 RA35 RH114 T35 + Griffith Park Rangers; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Fatality Traffic Collision; INC#0168; 02:55AM; 2601 W Obama Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3UadIBm; #LeimertPark; *Address Tentative* PRELIM: Two vehicle collision with one vehicle shearing a fire hydrant before traveling into a house, which subsequently caught fire. Four patients total, all believed to be from vehicle(s). Three were taken by LAFD Paramedics to a regional trauma center with unspecified injuries, including a 30-year-old female, 18-year-old-male and 19-year-old female. One additional patient (undetermined age/gender) was determined deceased and remains at scene. Media Inquiries: LAPD South Traffic Division (Incident #503) and Medical Examiner. ; FS 34; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; AR1 BC18 E294 E34 E94 RA26 RA34 RA834 RA94 T94; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0950; 02:59PM; 1161 N Virgil Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/44lVCkS; #EastHollywood; *Address Remains Tentative*. First arriving 30 LAFD Firefighters took just 21 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish stubborn flames in a one-story detached residence to the rear of a one-story home. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 E20 E211 E227 E235 E35 E52 E6 EM11 EM5 RA20 RA35 RA52 RA835 T11 T27 T35; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey
